content.rendered:
Directed by Ben Archard. Martyn Bon. Jelena Fahey. Jonathan Hales. Becky Harrington.

Written by Christine Rose.

Cast Kate Chastain (Self – Contestant 1). Cirie Fields (Self – Contestant 1). Arie Luyendyk Jr. (Self – Contestant 1). Christian de la Torre (Self – Contestant 1). Andie Thurmond (Self – Contestant 1). Quentin Jiles (Self – Contestant 1). John Ritchie (Grounds Keeper 1). Stephenie LaGrossa (Self – Contestant 1). Rachel Reilly (Self – Contestant). Cody Calafiore (Self – Contestant). Anjelica Conti (Self – Contestant). Shelbe Rodriguez (Self – Contestant). Kyle Cooke (Self – Contestant). Ryan Lochte (Self – Contestant). Amanda Clark-Stoner (Self – Contestant). Azra Valani (Self – Contestant). Michael Davidson (Self – Contestant). Brandi Glanville (Self – Contestant). Robert Bam Nieves (Self – Contestant). Geraldine Moreno (Self – Contestant). Reza Farahan (Self – Contestant). Andy Cohen (Self – Reunion Host). James MacKenzie (Bagpipes Player)

Language English.

Producers Noor Abdel-Razik. Mona Ansari-Beni. Georgia Beaman. Martyn Bon. Sara Booth. Abi Brooks. Sara Brownlow. Jack Burgess. Frankie Checkley. Mike Cotton. Jo Crawley. Alan Cummin/Epg. Micheal DiMaggio. Cait Downs. Jonathan Dutton. Joe Evans. Jelena Fahey.

Production Studio Lambert Scotland. Peacock. BBC.

No. of Season 1

No. of Episodes 12

Status OnGoing (2023–)
